review: Nothing works on this. Amazon Prime streaming is horrible, no good shows at all and Netflix won't play.
author: Christie Fabiano

review: We spent hours trying to program it. We had you replace it, still would not play any movies or tv shows. We were ready to send both back and my son saw a customer review the person said you had to point the remote toward TV and hold 4. Seconds. We did and it worked.We also spent time with your tech team and they did not know to Telly's to do the remote solution.Now I am happy.
author: William O. Hewett

review: I love being able connect it anywhere in the house to watch my shows.
author: Victoria Balassi

review: The Fire TV Stick was a great buy!  It was easy to install and quick to use.  I haven't downloaded all the apps yet but plan to do so.  It expands TV watching tremendously.  My husband and I are not sports fans or reality show fans so sometimes we were left with nothing much to watch but with the Fire TB Stick we can get programs we like and movies.
author: Librarian "Bookworm"

review: Works great, lots of choices. Very pleased with the choice.
author: Jean Burnand

review: I have both a roku sticj and the fire stick, the fire stick connects to the Internet faster than my roku.
author: sabrina Branch
